channel.title: Jacinto Building A New Standard for RsPs
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Jacinto[/size]
[url=http://Jacinto-rsps.com/forums]Jacinto-rsps.com[/url]
[u]Project Information.[/u] This server will be based on a project insanity base and client will either be the client that is released with the source or we will work on a new one our selves. This server will be a economy based server with excellent player killing.
[u]Developer Requirements.[/u] To join this team you really do not need much experience but you need to be a responsible but fun person who wil do their best to contribute. I will say i am not a good coder at all but i take my time to find things out and i like to learn as i go. So please dont hesitate to ask to join if you are not experienced
[u]Slots Open.[/u] [img]http://www.rune-server.org/nophp/avatars/prgrmr.png[/img]Server Developers[img]http://www.rune-server.org/nophp/avatars/prgrmr.png[/img] Myself Guthan Mane Pure k0 [img]http://www.rune-server.org/nophp/avatars/prgrmr.png[/img]Client Developer[img]http://www.rune-server.org/nophp/avatars/prgrmr.png[/img] Open Open
[u]Website Developer and Graphic Artist information[/u] I will be purchasing a domain and hosting but i do not have invasion power board or vbulletin software so if you have one of these and are looking for a project to join try this one and see how it goes. If we do not find someone who has one of these will will use the basic smf 2.0 which will do until enough donations come in to afford one of these. To be a website developer here you are not required to have one of these but atleast know how to use smf adequately. For the graphic designer spots are open for new and experienced artiest. this spot will be held accountable for creating signatures, support signatures, banners and logos. Graphic designers will received moderator rank over the Graphic section on the forums.
Spots open
Website Designer Myself Open Open Graphic Designer Open Open Open
[u]Beta tester information.[/u] We will be taking up to six beta testers (depending on how long we want to test) to help us find bugs and glitches in the game before its official release.
[u]Application Format.[/u] Username: Name: Skype: Experience (show some work if you please) Not needed if applying as tester: What Spot would you like:
Media will be added sometime this weekend unable to get on my main Computer right now so any further questions pm for my skype.
[size=28pt]*Edit* *Edit*[/size] [u]Information Regarding Payment and Donations[/u] I will allow the team to create a paypal together and trust the team to use the money for the server and website and when the server and website expenses are paid we will then split the rewards.
[size=24pt][u]Server Plans[/u][/size]
Color and link keys Pic will link you to a photo of our skilling Info will link you to what we will be trying to create -Green will mean the feature is complete -Orange will mean the feature in under construction -Red means we have not started
[u]Skills[/u]
[u]Combat[/u] -Melee --Attack [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Attack"]Info[/URL] --Defense [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Defense"]Info[/URL] --Strength [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Strength"]Info[/URL] -Range [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Range"]Info[/URL] -Magic [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Magic"]Info[/URL] -Prayer [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Prayer"]Info[/URL] -Will vote on constitution [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/constitution"]Info[/URL]
[u]Non-Combat Skills[/u] -Crafting [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/crafting"]Info[/URL] -Mining [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/mining"]Info[/URL] -Smithing [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/smithing"]Info[/URL] -Fishing [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/fishing"]Info[/URL] -Cooking [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/cooking"]Info[/URL] -Firemaking [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/firemaking"]Info[/URL] -Woodcutting [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Woodcutting"]Info[/URL] -Runecrafting [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Runecrafting"]Info[/URL] -Agility [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Agility"]Info[/URL] -Herblore [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Herblore"]Info[/URL] -Thieving [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Thieving"]Info[/URL] -Fletching [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Flecting"]Info[/URL] -Slayer [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Slayer"]Info[/URL] -Farming [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Farming"]Info[/URL] -Construction [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Construction"]Info[/URL] -Hunter (This will not be exactly like RuneScape but we will try to make it similar) [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Hunter"]Info[/URL] -Summoning [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Summoning"]Info[/URL] -Dungeoneering (Our own remake of the skill) [URL=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Dungeoneering"]Info[/URL]
[u]Minigames[/u] -Barrows -Duel Arena -Pest Control -Assault (Custom Minigame) -Zombies (will be rewarded by the amount of rewards you complete.) -Castle Wars -Fight Pits
[u]Bosses[/u] -King Black Dragon -Kalphite Queen -Chaos Element -Tormented Demons -All four Godwars Bosses -Nex -Boark -Maybe a custom boss or two
[/center]

item.dc:creator: @pure_k01 pure k0

item.title: Jacinto Building A New Standard for RsPs
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:8, topic:471203”]WHY OH WHY WOULD YOU BRING SOMETHING AS AMAZING AS GEARS OF WAR INTO THE WORLD OF RSPS. WHY. WHYYYYYYYY.

rips shirt[/quote]

Cause it is my favorite war game

[quote=“guthan mane, post:9, topic:471203”]Username: guthan mane
Name:Jacob
Skype: ill send via pm if accepted
Experience (show some work if you please) Not needed if applying as tester: ive been playing RSP’S since 2009 and also coding them since then, ive had a lot of experience with managing servers ive owned one with 400+ players on it ( i have pictures if ud like to see) ive never been able to remake my server because i get to bored of having no one to talk to and no one really to collaborate with sadly…
What Spot would you like: Server Dev ( i can do client and Website to… )[/quote]

accepted pm me

Note the server developer spot is now closed still searching for the others.

Read full topic

i am also a dedicated[/quote]

You have been accepted private message me your skype

hey iv been coding pi off and on for about 2 years and i was woundering if i could join im alright with server side if you have skype ill pm you my skype name

This server will be based on a project insanity base and client will either be the client that is released with the source or we will work on a new one our selves. This server will be a economy based server with excellent player killing.

Developer Requirements.
To join this team you really do not need much experience but you need to be a responsible but fun person who wil do their best to contribute. I will say i am not a good coder at all but i take my time to find things out and i like to learn as i go. So please dont hesitate to ask to join if you are not experienced
